content:
I would now like to turn the call over to Will Kostlivy, Head of Investor Relations at Atlas Corp.
 Good morning, everyone, and thank you for joining us today to discuss Atlas Corp.'s third quarter 2022 earnings report. This position was established through issuing a $500 million long-term floating to fixed rate interest swap in Q1 at 1.9%, a $500 million fixed rate U.S. private placement in Q2 used to pay down existing shorter-term floating rate debt and an additional $75 million long-term floating fixed rate swap in Q3 of 2.4%.
